siya golayan pirisa athadanguwata pathwa athi bawa nodath wariyapola bandhanagaraye rakshitha bandhanagaragathawa sitimin heroyin jawarama meheyawana es.ef. lokka pereda (8da) pallekale jathyanthara krikat kridanganaye pawathi shri lankawa ha dakunu aprikawa athara krikat tharagaya narambaamin owunta parusha wachana kiyamin kako gasana atharaware "yako athana gram panahak hangapan, athanin thawa gram 10k hangapan mama kiyana widiyata karapalla yako" yanuwen widhanayak labademin jawarama meheyawana ayuru amathumwalata sawan demin polisiya anawaranaya karagena thibini.
